items.body: The new XX99 Mark II headphones is the pinnacle of pristine audio. It redefines your premium headphone experience by reproducing the balanced depth and precision of studio-quality sound.

items.name: FEATURES
items.body1: The new XX99 Mark II headphones is the pinnacle of pristine audio. It redefines your premium headphone experience by reproducing the balanced depth and precision of studio-quality sound.
items.body2: As the gold standard for headphones, the classic XX99 Mark I offers detailed and accurate audio reproduction for audiophiles, mixing engineers, and music aficionados alike in studios and on the go.As the gold standard for headphones

items.info_body: Located at the heart of New York City, Audiophile is the premier store for high end headphones, earphones, speakers, and audio accessories. We have a large showroom and luxury demonstration rooms available for you to browse and experience a wide range of our products. Stop by our store to meet some of the fantastic people who make Audiophile the best place to buy your portable audio equipment.
